title: AI-Enabled Stethoscopes May Boost Diagnosis Of Heart Diseases: Study
description: Amid growing influence of artificial intelligence (AI) in healthcare, a new large-scale clinical trial published in The Lancet on Thursday showed that an AI-enabled stethoscope can boost early detection of various heart diseases.
content:
New Delhi:
Amid growing influence of artificial intelligence (AI) in healthcare, a new large-scale clinical trial published in The Lancet on Thursday showed that an AI-enabled stethoscope can boost early detection of various heart diseases.

title: What is the benefit for AI in learning humour?
description: Generative artificial intelligence cannot create good jokes. But it is getting better
content:
Does AI threaten creativity or is AI threatened by creativity?

title: Pennant Technologies Recognised in Multiple Gartner® Reports on AI
description: Hyderabad (Telangana) [India], January 29: Pennant Technologies, an agile and innovative financial technology company, today announced its inclusion in two recent Gartner reports focused on the application of artificial intelligence (AI) in banking. According to Pennant, the reports highlight how banks can apply predictive AI, synthetic data, and AI agents to strengthen credit risk management, improve loan orchestration, and operational efficiency across the lending lifecycle.

title: Nvidia's CEO says China is still finalising license for H200
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday he hopes China will allow the U.S. technology giant to sell its powerful H200 artificial intelligence chip in the country and that the licence is being finalised.
content:
